name: ALCHEMYGHT
description:
ALCHEMYGHT by FISTMAKER & KING AURORUS

fistmaker.itch.io / twitter @fistmakergames

https://kingaurorusmusic.com/

This is my entry for the Retrograde Jam #3 ALCHEMYGHT!

It's made to be very close to an NES style game from the 80's.

Take control of GWEN as she searches for the REAGENTS to cure the town of LYCHGATE's mysterious illness. MIX REAGENTS to make POTIONS with various effects! POTIONS sometimes have ENVIRONMENTAL EFFECTS outside of combat, so try them everywhere!

Full Controller & Keyboard Support

Controls:

Full Controller & Keyboard Support

D-Pad / Arrow Keys : Move

X / F: Attack

UP / Up Arrow & Attack: Throw selected potion

Down / Down Arrow: Duck

Down / Down Arrow & Attack: Duck Attack

A / Spacebar: Jump

Duck & Jump: Drop down

Start / R: Mixing Menu

Select / E: Select Active Potion

RetrogradeJam Version!

Game is able to be won with NO combat!!! Yay for PUZZLES! 

Some NPC's would like your help with stuff! Granny is very helpful with hints!

Block webs with your shield (by standing still!)

LIFESTONES can be found that increase your MAXIMUM HEALTH!

Press SELECT (Shift) to choose active POTION!

AUTO POTION option available after crafting a POTION for the first time.

SECRETS!!!
